name: Classic Home
description: Classy and easy to use classic slider, our show piece theme with light colours and easy to navigate menu. Wide and varied collection or TV, movies and music and more

name: Lost In Space
description: One for the fantasy and space lovers out there. Lost in space?? Try lost in films, sport and music. Packed with all the best sport, movies, TV and music

name: Kids Lite
description: Quick and easy to load, this ultra light kids version is great for the little ones, plenty to keep them entertained and you can be sure that theres nothing on there that they shouldn't be seeing.
